text:
Dazed Awakening

A dim room; shadows of night linger.  
He hears distant, frantic cries.  
‘Ah! The drunken men are out!’  

---

A sudden realization strikes him.  
‘What! Past two o’clock!’  
He leaps up, panic surging.  

---

Chilled to the bone, he shivers.  
‘Am I going mad?’  
He listens; silence fills the house.

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The protagonist awakens in a daze, recalling the events of the previous night with a sense of fear and confusion.
